text:
とどいたデータ以外のアクセスに制限かけて、それがfaultしたらpullして...みたいな?
CoWの逆やるというかなんというか?

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/gorilla0513|@gorilla0513>: え
Lazy-pullingってイメージ全部ダウンロードしきれなくても使えるってこと？ <https://twitter.com/_akihirosuda_/status/1295376062994497536>
attachments.author_name: ゴリラ@バナナ探してる
attachments.text:
え
Lazy-pullingってイメージ全部ダウンロードしきれなくても使えるってこと？ <https://twitter.com/_akihirosuda_/status/1295376062994497536>

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/_AkihiroSuda_|@_AkihiroSuda_>: Wrote a blog about <https://twitter.com/containerd|@containerd> 1.4 (released today). This release includes a lot of novel features such as “lazy-pulling”, SELinux MCS on CRI, cgroup v2, and Windows CRI! <https://medium.com/nttlabs/containerd14-70ae3ea29dba>
attachments.text: Wrote a blog about <https://twitter.com/containerd|@containerd> 1.4 (released today). This release includes a lot of novel features such as “lazy-pulling”, SELinux MCS on CRI, cgroup v2, and Windows CRI! <https://medium.com/nttlabs/containerd14-70ae3ea29dba>
